Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.network.RMI.server

Class HeartbeatManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.network.RMI.server.HeartbeatManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeartbeatInterface, Remote
public class HeartbeatManager extends Object implements HeartbeatInterface
This class is used by the server to manage the heartbeat of the clients. Implements the HeartbeatInterface interface.

  • Method Details

    • ping

      public void ping (@NotNull @NotNull String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: HeartbeatInterface
      The client calls this method to ping the server.

      Every n milliseconds that the server provides with HeartbeatInterface.getInterval().

      The server checks if the client has sent a ping within the last 5n milliseconds.

      Specified by:
      ping in interface HeartbeatInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.

    • getInterval

      public int getInterval() throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: HeartbeatInterface
      The client calls this method to get the interval between two pings.
      Specified by:
      getInterval in interface HeartbeatInterface
      Returns:
      The interval between two pings in milliseconds.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote error occurs.

    • close

      public void close()
      Close the HeartbeatManager.

      It shuts down all the executors used and clears all clients.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clear the map of connected clients.
